content: held sts back on needles row 103 109 121 129 135 k1 ssk repeat *p1 k1b* to last st k1 1 st decreased row 104 110 122 130 136 p1 k to last st p1 row 105 111 123 131 137 k1 repeat *k1b p1* to last 2 sts k1b k1 bind off sleeves using a mattress st seam the front and back shoulders together and the bottom 6 6 25 7 7 25 7 5 in of the body along the armhole starting from the underarm seam pick up and knit 36 40 44 48 50 sts join in the round and pm for bor 4 round 1 repeat *k1 p1* to end round 2 p round 3 repeat *k1b p1* to end round 4 p rounds 5-8 repeat rounds 3-4 round 9 repeat *k1b p1* to end round 10 k1 p to last 2 sts pm for new bor remove old bor m round 11 kb3tog p1 repeat *k1b p1* to end 2 sts decreased round 12 p rounds 13-18 repeat rounds 3-4 repeat rounds 9-18 three four five five five more times repeat rounds 3-4 until finishing round 58 64 74 80 88 or until sleeve is 0 75 in less than desired length cuff repeat *k1 p1* for 6 rounds bind off collar along the neckline pick up and knit 76 80 80 84 88 sts place m for bor rounds 1-6 repeat *k1 p1* bind off finishing fold the bottom 0 75 in of the bottom hem towards the inside and sew it in place using a whip st using yarn in a contrasting color the baby s name can be embroidered on the front using a chain stitch for longer names it may be helpful to start from the middle of the name and work outwards to help with letter spacing sew in ends and block as desired contact jmiyoknits@gmail com instagram @craftingmediocrity #wesbabysweater ©j miyo knits 2025 5
